extensionDescription.message: Improves the UI of various Google services, taking these already user-friendly services to the next level.

featuresLabel.description: The label for the collapsible section.

featureCollapsibleStudioDesc.message: Adds a collapsible section to the 'Studio' panel to hide the feature buttons.

featureButtonEnhancerDesc.message: Changes the default click action of 'Audio' or 'Video' buttons to open the edit prompt instead of auto-generating.

featureNblmEnterKey.description: Feature name for NotebookLM Enter key.

featureNblmEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and 'Shift + Enter' to submit the prompt.

settingsSaved.description: Confirmation message when settings are saved.

featureGeminiShortcuts.description: Feature name for Gemini tool shortcuts.

featureGeminiShortcutsDesc.message: Show Deep Research and Canvas buttons directly in the prompt bar.

featureGeminiEnterKey.description: Feature name for Gemini Enter key.

featureGeminiEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and 'Shift + Enter' to submit the prompt.

featureGeminiLayoutWidth.description: Feature name for Gemini content width.

featureGeminiLayoutWidthDesc.message: Set a custom max-width for the chat history and prompt area (760-5000px).

featureChatEnterKey.description: Feature name for Google Chat Enter key.

featureChatEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and 'Shift + Enter' to send the message.
featureChatEnterKeyDesc.description: Description for Google Chat Enter key.
